comments.commentBody:
Mr Trump's "pugnacious" style? Why does the media constantly try to normalize the Donald? Call this what it is, reckless behavior with no respect for the office of the Presidency and it's responsibility. We'll do whatever we want no matter what the risks and make more money doing it. To heck with what some people think.

All your suspicions are true and the some. This guy and his administration are a bunch of small time crooks that can't be trusted.

And there's a whole lot more to this which will eventually come out even though the GOP will do their best to squelch the truth. Stay tuned. Make America Great Again. Yeah, right.

Dear Amyl,

My heart aches for you and for Jason. please know that you and your family are in my thoughts and prayers. You both seem to have had an incredibly special relationship. Blessings to both of you and to your children.

Maria,

Slightly tangential but Not sure I understand your reasoning fully. What of the many spouses who remain loving, loyal and devoted and yet are discarded by their spouses for someone else. The cheating spouses are wonderful to everyone but their spouse, they are captivated by their affair partner. In that situation is it the affair partner who brings out the "fabulous aspects" of the errant spouse? Or is it the loyal spouse's good nature that brings out the best qualities in the errant spouse that s/he then bestows on his/her affair partner?
God bless you. Your husband has been a lucky man. I think you handled your final job as well as any great writer could.
So, if he was a turd, it'd be her fault too?  [sigh]
Thank you, Amy. You've inspired me to swipe right on all the plans that were waiting for the right time and to put more into sharing my life.
Simple: life is a miracle, try to treat it as such. Try with everything you do and everyone you meet. Then hopefully you have lived the miracle. That is all we get.
I'm a little young fo yo man but you should send your mom to Beijing with my mom for a dream tour of Asia.

I don't care what he was doing. His mere presence there was a pox on the democratic process and a stain on the Republican Party that won't soon come out. A national political convention is no place for foreign agents.

The pendulum has swung backwards. The former rabidly anti-communist party of Senator Joe McCarthy (after he was a Democrat) has now become the unapologetic (except for the lying) Russophile Party.

"Nothing to see here, folks. Move along!"

Except that there is plenty to see, and to smell. It stinks to high heaven, and the self-described "swamp-drainer in chief" Trumpy the Swamp Thing has refilled it with populist Russophiles who see nothing wrong with conspiring and colluding with the enemy as long as the ends can justify those means.

How many Americans know about the American ("Know Nothing") Party? That's the historical dustbin into which the current Republican Party will hopefully find itself in a few election cycles, replaced by something less Russophile and more republican.

To avoid the power of blackmail the Trump people just need to tell Russia to f* off. Americans are so mesmerized by Trump that they will not care what comes out. Trump's people have nothing to be afraid of from the American people.  America knows what it was getting in Trump and they wanted it. We wanted jobs over Social Security, Medicare or health insurance. We wanted crappy water and air so businessmen could make more money and get lower taxes. and we wanted much lower taxes for the rich so the GOP could maximize campaign contributions. And finally we want taxpayer's to pay for school vouchers so young white Christian children do not have to go to school and learn science or be around African Americans.

Amy-
so many thoughts, things, places, times are going through my mind. It's been a long time, and I am deeply sorry and moved. I am thinking of you and sending love and admiration for all you do and all the people you have touched & inspired each and every day. You are such an incredible, beautiful person; mind, body and soul. All of us are lucky to know you, and keep in your thoughts how incredibly loved you are!

It's really becoming tiresome to hear Trump dancing around denying the "Russian ruse." He could end all the questions raised by the steady  drip-drip of news stories about his Russian connections by simply releasing his tax returns. As one of his biographers pointed out about his business failures in the 1990s, "he owed a lot of money and then suddenly he didn't. So who got him out of debt?" If it was the Russians, we should know about it and the truth will eventually come out. If not he's in the clear and can get on with the business of governance.

May we all find contentment and peace. Amy has given us a gift. I am a fraction of the man that Jason is and likely will never date or marry someone like Amy. We do the best we can with the world we find ourselves in. We send love to Amy and to you as well.
Wow.

Dear Amy,

What a beautiful and generous outpouring! You made me smile, and I think you might might have even achieved your objective today for you husband! God bless you and your family, and I wish you, as odd as it may sound, a happy death.

Anne
A marriage well lived.

I do not know you, Amy, nor am I familiar with your previous writings. I am fortunate enough that my mother is a cancer survivor, but two grandparents and an aunt did not share her luck over the years. I grew up around cancer; I am intimately familiar with it. It is a thief. It takes the kindest, the most brilliant, the people whose power is in how much they love life. It just robs. So for someone to maintain the dignity, wit, grace, and love laid out in this article is a heroic feat, indeed. I don't know what to say, Amy, except that you are here, you are heard, and you are so very clearly loved. And none of that stops with a heartbeat.

Then there are those of us who get the diagnosis "large mass on your ovary" and live through the mental gyrations of who will care or does it matter (because my husband has already skipped away). The one sweetness in the time you get is "being" with the someone who loves you beyond the time you get. Hold hands and blessings to you both.

I'm sorry your family is going through this. It is a hard road. My husband was diagnosed with cancer July 18, 2016 I was 6 months pregnant. We didn't know it at the time but it ended up taking his life on December 2. I am now a widow with a 5, 4, 2 year old, and the baby turned 4 months old today. Your husband will eventually grateful for the knowledge that you would want him to find someone to love again. I am grateful that my late husband wrote it in his journal and I was able to read it after his death. My the rest of your days be filled with joy and love.

Sincerely, Cassie
A wonderful love letter.. Thank you for letting us in  on it.
Sessions may claim to have conversed with the Russians in Cleveland while in his role as a Senator, but he flew there on a plane paid for by the Trump campaign.

So that we can put this in a perspective even school children can appreciate, I'd like to see a graph that compares how many times Trump's team, including Jeff Sessions, had contact with Russia and how many time they contacted France, England, Italy, Japan, Germany or any other country for that matter.

I believe Sen. Sessions didn't think he was lying when he answered Sen. Franken.  As much as I dislike him (I'm with Sen. Warren and Ms King on that), the implication in the question was if there was any discussion of back scratching for the new administration proposed between Kislyak and Sessions.  I think that was the question Sessions answered, not did you speak to any Russian about anything whatsoever. If these were in-person meetings we can only hope that testimony from third parties will verify what was said.  Phone conversations, as Flynn learned, are recorded for Mr. Kislyak.
Lying is a prerequisite for any elected official in the US government. It's an inborn talent.

How prescient that it was Sen. Franken who wrote "Lies: and the Lying Liars who tell them," back in '04. The political culture of just believing you can get away with any hog wash that comes out of your mouth is reaching global warming enhanced highs. Does this crowd believe: A) 46% of the voters are silly enough to believe them; or B) too mentally and morally impoverished to distinguish their own lies from fantasy, or C) both? These folks hung that word on Hillary for so long perhaps they've come to use it as an endearment. Cute little lying Jeff.

With Jeff Sessions at the tiller, at least we have a functioning justice department. Contrariwise, the treasury has a leader and some left over staffers only. It appears that DJT is tired and bored with the job already and not doing any work (work is boring) to fill many empty slots with many more going empty every day. We knew this guys - a short little span of attention he has.

Several pundits have said that the 'American People' wanted change. Hillary represented more of the same old. We knew what we were going to get. We didn't want that, so even knowing that Trump was bad, we said yeah, he's bad, but how bad can he be. Let's roll the dice.

We expected seven and got snake eyes.
